q: me. You're a pro. You're a hell of a lot better than others in this town.'' Howard Kurtz suspects that Donald Rumsfeld 's goal with this memoir is to leave readers with the same conclusion. But it contains few surprises and, after so many years of divisive debate, is unlikely to change many minds, writes Howard Kurtz . ''What is known is that he has in these 50 chapters marshaled his best defense; only history's final verdict remains unknown.'' Donald Rumsfeld , that master of the tart zinger,... Photo

intentions. Kent Conrad , 62, who's led efforts to get the John McCain budget under control, said on Tuesday that he will not run for a sixth term in the Senate in 2012. It is more important Sen. Joe Lieberman spend my time and energy trying to solve these( budget) problems than to be distracted by a campaign for re-election, Kent Conrad said in a statement. Democrats now control the Senate 53-47. There are 51 Democrats and two independents-- Sen. Joe Lieberman and Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont, both of whom caucus with Democrats. Democratic Party

,... Barack Obama to run for president in 2012 Washington, January 21: US Barack Obama has planned to run for a second term in office for the 2012 presidential election despite his low popularity. Salmon , a Republican who switched from the Democratic Party in 2009, confirmed Tuesday that he is considering running for the U.S. Senate next year against independent incumbent Sen. Bernie Sanders . We're in the very early stages, said Thomas P. Salmon of St. Johnsbury, who has alluded to challenging Sen. Bernie Sanders in Facebook messages and elsewhere. Paul Thurrott quotes Stephen Elop and gives his opinion: ''Microsoft, meanwhile, has a ''great software platform'' in Windows Phone, and the brands that mobile consumers want, like Bing, Xbox LIVE, and Office.( Side-note: Zune was conspicuously absent from this list. It is my opinion and guess that Microsoft is currently phasing out the Zune brand and will simply roll the various Zune services into Windows Live.)

Simon Cowell was less PC, of course, saying Lindsey Cardinale 's version was the musical equivalent of Ryan Seacrest : you look the part, do everything right, and yet you're disappointed with the performance. Stewing off to the side, Ryan Seacrest decided proper payback was throwing a cup of water to Simon Cowell 's face-- which he did in one of the show's truly dramatic moments. 8. Josh Gracin ''I Do

year- revealed on the show today( 03.02.11) that she and partner DJ Darren Emerson split some time ago, but have remained close in order to protect their two-year-old son Ben. She said: As you ladies are aware I separated from Darren Emerson some time ago and we have worked through this together. We have come to terms with it now and are now able to speak about it. Every relationship where a child is involved is born out of love. There is a little boy in the middle and he has to come first. There is an overwhelming emotion of sadness but it doesn't make me want to scream and shout. It makes me want to learn from it. ''I wouldn't watch the show now because it would be like seeing your ex-boyfriend with his new girlfriend.'' Kate Thornton and Darren Emerson started dating in 2004 and got engaged in 2007.
